thread.title: Bank of America to Lose Executive Overseeing Europe

author: Rachel Louise Ensign
title: Bank of America to Lose Executive Overseeing Europe
text:
Alex Wilmot-Sitwell, Bank of America’s president of Europe, the Middle East and Africa, is leaving the firm, the bank announced on Friday, according to a memo viewed by The Wall Street Journal.
Mr. Wilmot-Sitwell “has informed me of his decision to leave the firm to pursue opportunities outside the bank,” the bank’s chief operating officer, Tom Montag, said in the memo.
